posts.post_content:
I have a friend working on a T206 subset of southern leaguers, and he's looking for a Bill Hart. I offered him my Old Mill (shown below), but he prefers one with a Piedmont back. Figured I'd give it a shot to see whether anyone wants to trade a comparable Piedmont Bill Hart for mine. If yours is nicer, I'll kick in some cash to even things. If yours is a grade or two lower but presents nicely, that's fine. (The back of mine is problem free.)

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Email me[/URL] if you'd like to work out something.

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com[/URL]
